3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent dimensional transformation and isometric projection; walls and floors are clearly distinct.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful layout. Minor discrepancies in the bathroom/closet wall thicknesses compared to the primary plan.

interior_elements.notes: Nearly all furniture items (sofas, beds, kitchen island, dining table) are correctly placed and scaled.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering, but presence of 3D floating text labels ('Bedroom', 'Kitchen/Living') results in a small deduction in presentation score.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D plan rendered as 3D geometry floating in the space.
Some window frame thicknesses slightly exaggerated compared to the 2D architectural lines.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that meticulously translates the 2D floor plan into a readable isometric model.
